articles.title: Kathleen Folbigg: Mother who served 20 years for killing her four babies pardoned - CNN
articles.description: A woman condemned as Australia’s worst female serial killer has been pardoned after serving 20 years behind bars for killing her four children in what appears to be one of the country’s gravest miscarriages of justice.
